heading: HR00953
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE RECENT UNEXPLAINABLE SURGE IN POWER RATES AND TO FURTHER AVERT ESCALATION IN TRANSMISSION RATES, AS IT MAY BE INDICATIVE OF FAILURES IN REGULATORY OVERSIGHT OF THE POWER INDUSTRY PARTICULARLY THE TRANSMISSION SECTOR IN ORDER TO EASE THE BURDEN OF ELECTRICITY CONSUMERS RESULTING FROM THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC
principal-authors: FERNANDEZ, DAN S.; VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND "LRAY" JR F.; YAP, ERIC G.; TOLENTINO, ABRAHAM "BAMBOL" N.; BAUTISTA, CLAUDINE DIANA D.; TAN, ALYSSA SHEENA P.;
status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2020-06-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00953
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE RECENT UNEXPLAINABLE SURGE IN POWER RATES AND TO FURTHER AVERT ESCALATION IN TRANSMISSION RATES, AS IT MAY BE INDICATIVE OF FAILURES IN REGULATORY OVERSIGHT OF THE POWER INDUSTRY PARTICULARLY THE TRANSMISSION SECTOR IN ORDER TO EASE THE BURDEN OF ELECTRICITY CONSUMERS RESULTING FROM THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FERNANDEZ, DAN S., VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND "LRAY" JR F., YAP, ERIC G., TOLENTINO, ABRAHAM "BAMBOL" N., BAUTISTA, CLAUDINE DIANA D., TAN, ALYSSA SHEENA P.
